1371: Mense was born in Nieu straet in 1371.
1375: Lost mother at the age of 4 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 4.
Lost father at the age of 4.
Left Nieu straet.A.3 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 5.
1379: Lost sibling Rolekine in 1379 when Rolekine was 6.
1388: Mense moved to Die Coninc straet.A.5 in 1388.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1389: Got married to Emgelberna at age 19 in 1389.
Had Emgelberna move in at Die Coninc straet.A.5 after marriage.
1391: Had a daughter with Emgelberna, Atghardis, at age 20.
1399: Had a son with Emgelberna, Lucas, at age 28.
